title: LS-DSC Integrated Mathematics Teacher Professional Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Asynchronous collaborative learning and formative assessment-centered operation in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Enhance mathematics lesson design competency by over 40% within six months by applying Lesson Study (LS) methodology.
Achieve 85% accuracy in peer feedback using the DSC (Degree of Suitability for Instruction) evaluation tool.
Apply five or more question-design strategies for student-centered discussion classes in actual teaching settings.
Analyze formative assessment data to create lesson improvement plans at least three times.

resources: LMS platform (video, discussion board, assignment submission functionality)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
